about_the_game:
You are the Dungeon Man!
You spent your youth hearing tales of a mysterious dungeon guarded by a dangerous fiend known as the toilet snake.
The toilet snake is said to have arrived from an unknown land filled with powerful gems. The toilet snake uses these gems to command a great power.
You have stumbled upon the entrance to the dungeon and found a mysterious white gem.
Step inside the dungeon to find what power the gem holds.
Only by defeating the evil toilet snake can you unlock the true power of the gems.

In this top down bullet-hell you make your way through the mysterious dungeon using the colors of the gems to defeat your enemies.
Mix and match colors to deal the most damage.

content_descriptors.notes: Mild Fantasy Violence Involving Magic Spells

detailed_description:
You are the Dungeon Man!
You spent your youth hearing tales of a mysterious dungeon guarded by a dangerous fiend known as the toilet snake.
The toilet snake is said to have arrived from an unknown land filled with powerful gems. The toilet snake uses these gems to command a great power.
You have stumbled upon the entrance to the dungeon and found a mysterious white gem.
Step inside the dungeon to find what power the gem holds.
Only by defeating the evil toilet snake can you unlock the true power of the gems.

In this top down bullet-hell you make your way through the mysterious dungeon using the colors of the gems to defeat your enemies.
Mix and match colors to deal the most damage.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 76000 GS (512 MB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: These requirements are not final

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 or later
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 1024 MB RAM
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: These requirements are not final

name: Dungeon Man

Recommended:

  • Processor: i5

  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: These requirements are not final

short_description: A bullet-hell dungeon game where you use colored gems to match the enemy in order to deal damage. Each enemy type has a unique attack style. Shoot and Dodge as you search for the evil toilet snake which lies deep within the dungeon.
